claim: Liev Schreiber made appearances in many independent films.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He became known during the late 1990s and early 2000s , having appeared in several independent films , and later mainstream Hollywood films , including the Scream trilogy of horror films , Ransom  (  1996  )  , Phantoms  (  1998  )  , The Sum of All Fears  (  2002  )  , The Omen  (  2006  )  , X-Men Origins : Wolverine  (  2009  )  , Taking Woodstock  (  2009  )  , Salt  (  2010  )  , Goon  (  2011  )  , Pawn Sacrifice  (  2014  )  , and Spotlight  (  2015  )  .
